name: Shroom Me Up Granny
description:
Explore a beautiful world filled with charming characters and go on an awesome quest to defeat capitalism with the magical help of 420 and memes.

 We have awsome particel effects, procedural broken glas and incredible two endings!

Shroom Me Up Granny is our first game as a team made for the Magical Girl Game Jam #4

Everything in the game is handcrafted and fairtrade!
